content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
─────────────────────
No Lab has been successfully placed. The agent has, however, utilized two existing smelting facilities for production:

### Iron Plate Furnace at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0)
Use-case: Smelts iron ore and coal to produce iron plates.
Consists of:
– Furnace located at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0)

### Copper Furnace at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0)
Use-case: Smelts copper ore and coal to produce copper plates for further processing.
Consists of:
– Furnace located at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0)

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• API Call Consistency:
 – Call get_entities using the correct signature. Avoid using unsupported keywords (such as “radius”) or an incorrect number of positional arguments.

• Null Iterable Handling:
 – When retrieving entities, validate the result isn’t None before iterating. Use a fallback empty list to prevent “NoneType” object errors.

• Lab Crafting Dependencies:
 – Confirm that all required sub-ingredients (for example, iron-gear-wheel, electronic-circuit, copper-cable) are available.
 – Ensure intermediary production (such as smelting needed raw materials) is sufficient prior to attempting lab crafting.

• Inventory and Placement Verification:
 – Verify available inventory and check that target placement positions are unoccupied before attempting to craft or place a structure.
